DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate CLEAR CARE® PLUS ( CCP ) compare non-HYDRAGLYDE® multipurpose contact lens solution presbyope currently wear soft contact lenses experience symptom dryness .
DOC.brief_title: CLEAR CARE® PLUS Presbyopic Contact Lens Wearers
DOC.criteria: Must sign inform consent document ; Current adapt twoweek/monthly replacement soft contact lens wearer ( least 2 month ) symptom contact lens induced dryness ; Near spectacle add +0.50 great ; Best correct visual acuity ( BCVA ) 20/30 good eye distance ; Willing wear lens minimum 5 day per week , 6 hour per day , attend study visit ; Currently ( least 2 month ) use nonHYDRAGLYDE® contain multipurpose solution ( OPTIFREE® PureMoist® exclude ) care lenses ; Use digital device ( eg , smart phone , tablet , laptop computer , desktop computer ) 20 consecutive minute least twice week willing continue pattern duration study ; Other protocolspecific inclusion criterion may apply . Extended wear contact lens wearer ( sleeps lenses 1 night per week ) ; Any anterior segment infection , inflammation , disease , abnormality contraindicates contact lens wear determine investigator ; Any use systemic ocular medication contact lens wear could contraindicate , determine investigator , include use topical ocular medication would require instillation contact lens wear ; Monocular ( 1 eye functional vision ) fit 1 lens ; Known sensitivity ingredient CCP ; Prior refractive surgery ; History herpetic keratitis , ocular surgery , irregular cornea ; Pathological dry eye precludes contact lens wear ; Use mechanical eyelid therapy eyelid scrub within 14 day Visit 1 willing discontinue study ; Participation clinical study within 30 day Visit 1 ; Currently use discontinue Restasis® , Xiidra® topical steroid within past 7 day ; Other protocolspecific exclusion criterion may apply .
